title: Friend's Screen goes blank after he presses continue on the victory/defeat screen
body:
(edit - Thank you all for helping us . We were able to get the game working for our friend so now we can hang out again.)

A friend recently picked up the game and says he's getting a blank screen when he clicks continue on the victory/defeat screen. 

So far the only way he's found to get out of this is to restart the computer. I need some ideas as to what could be causing this.

replies.body:
Tell you friends to repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/template_lcu_changelog_1280x720.jpg?itok=uV6zjzTq
Thank you for taking the time to answer this question. We'll see if that works later tonight when we meet up.

That's definitely not a good way to end a game! A repair is a good place to start, as *Rineyy* has suggested, however, a more comprehensive list of potential solutions can be found in [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) Since it sounds like the application is hanging and potential causing the entire computer to freeze, this may be caused by bad drivers or other system settings. The guide I provided will help you go through some common solutions. 

If your friend still has issues after working through that guide, hit me up.
